glsa.title: X2Go Server: Arbitrary code execution
glsa.synopsis: A path vulnerability in X2Go Server may allow remote execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: X2Go is an open source terminal server project.

description.p: A vulnerability in the setgid wrapper x2gosqlitewrapper.c does not hardcode an internal path to x2gosqlitewrapper.pl, allowing a remote attacker to change that path.

impact.p: A remote attacker may be able to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the server process.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All X2Go Server users should upgrade to the latest version:
